actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to repeal the provision which permits States to prohibit agreements requiring membership in a labor organization as a condition of employment.

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act to repeal a provision which permits a State or Territory to prohibit agreements requiring membership in a labor organization as a condition of employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to repeal the provision which permits States to prohibit agreements requiring membership in a labor organization as a condition of employment.
